Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  Shape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FreeHandObject, Text, TwoPointShape
public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Abstract interface for all Shapes that may be manipulated by MultiDraw.

See Also:
Serialized Form

draw

abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
Requires a class implementing this class to define how to draw itself.

Parameters:
g - Graphics context for drawing.

drawHighlightBoxes

abstract void drawHighlightBoxes(java.awt.Graphics g)
This class defines how each object's resize boxes will be drawn,

interior

abstract boolean interior(int x,
                          int y)
Indicate if an event at this position would be considered inside this shape.

Parameters:
x - X co-ordinate.
y - Y co-ordinate.
Returns:
Returns true if event is 'inside' the shape.

exterior

abstract boolean exterior(int x,
                          int y)
Indicate if an event at this position would be considered at the edges of the shape.

Parameters:
x - X co-ordinate.
y - Y co-ordinate.
Returns:
Returns true if the x,y values are at the edge of this shape.

near

boolean near(int x,
             int y)
Combines interior/exterior methods to indicate if a position is near the object.

Parameters:
x - X position
y - Y Position
Returns:
Returns true if interior/exterior returns true, false otherwise.

Parameters:
(int) - d X position (start).
e - Y position (start).
f - X position (end).
g - Y position (end).

pickAnchor

abstract java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double pickAnchor(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double p)
If asked, the object can return a point that will be considered the anchor. This becomes important when resizing, and one or more points need to stay fixed.

Parameters:
p - Point of interest, shape can use this to decide how it will pick an anchor.
Returns:
Returns an anchor point.

resize

abstract void resize(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point,
                     int deltaX,
                     int deltaY)
Each shape will implement a method to resize.

Parameters:
point - Anchor point.
deltaX - Change in X.
deltaY - Change in Y.

move

abstract void move(int x,
                   int y)
Each shape will implement a move method.

Parameters:
x - Change in X.
y - Change in Y.
